tool_description: Monitors inventory levels against predefined thresholds and generates alerts when stock levels breach minimum, maximum, or reorder point thresholds.

current_stock.description: Current stock levels for each SKU

sku_list.description: SKU identifiers corresponding to stock levels

min_thresholds.description: Minimum stock thresholds for each SKU

max_thresholds.description: Maximum stock thresholds for each SKU

reorder_points.description: Reorder point thresholds for each SKU

alert_priority.description: Alert priority level: LOW, MEDIUM, HIGH, CRITICAL

error_messages: Array length mismatch: All provided arrays must have the same length as sku_list.
Invalid threshold values: Thresholds must be non-negative integers.
Invalid priority level: Use one of [LOW, MEDIUM, HIGH, CRITICAL].
Threshold logic error: max_thresholds must be greater than min_thresholds when both are provided.
Empty required arrays: current_stock, sku_list, and min_thresholds cannot be empty.
usage: Provide current_stock, sku_list, and min_thresholds arrays. Optionally add max_thresholds, reorder_points, and set alert_priority. The tool compares stock levels against thresholds and returns alerts for any breaches.

alerts_generated.description: Total number of threshold breach alerts generated

alert_types.description: Types of alerts: LOW_STOCK, OVERSTOCK, REORDER_NEEDED

breach_details.description: Detailed descriptions of each threshold breach
